thread.title: Will Kent State win the 2045 championship?
thread.title_full: Will Kent State win the 2045 championship?

author: Courtney Danser
title: Will Kent State win the 2045 championship?
text:
Previous Next 
KENT, Ohio - ESPN joined in on the Back to the Future fun Wednesday, predicting a champion for the 2045 football season. 
And apparently the Kent State Golden Flashes are going to come out on top. 
Sports analyst Trevor Matich said his almanac shows that the Kent State football team will dominate that year. 
By his prediction, the team will be one of the 127 teams in the East of the Mississippi Conference. 
Kent State Athletics responded, tweeting "GREAT SCOTT! When we have a chance to hang a banner, we do it!" GREAT SCOTT! When we have a chance to hang a banner, we do it! Thanks @ESPNCFB https://t.co/3mZ6Qqoa3T pic.twitter.com/n1fstQwejV â€” Kent State Athletics (@KentStAthletics) October 21, 2015 
Last year the Golden Flashes went 2-9. But hey, they still have 30 years to prepare.
